Package org.zaproxy.zap.scan

Class BaseContextScannerThread<StartOptions extends ScanStartOptions,Listener extends ScanListener>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
org.zaproxy.zap.scan.BaseScannerThread<StartOptions>
org.zaproxy.zap.scan.BaseContextScannerThread<StartOptions,Listener>
Type Parameters:
StartOptions - the type of the start scan options
Listener - the type of scan listener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public abstract class BaseContextScannerThread<StartOptions extends ScanStartOptions,Listener extends ScanListener> extends BaseScannerThread<StartOptions>
An implementation of a BaseScannerThread for scans done on Contexts, adding support for notifying a list of scan listeners.
See Also:

  • ScanListener
  • Context

      protected void notifyScanFinished()
      Notifies listeners that the scan has finished.

    • notifyScanProgress

      protected void notifyScanProgress()
      Notifies listeners that the scan has changes it's progress. The progress sent to the listeners is the one set for the scan (via setScanProgress(int)).

    • setScanProgress

      public void setScanProgress(int progress)
      Description copied from class: BaseScannerThread
      Sets the scan's progress, on a scale from 0 to BaseScannerThread.getScanMaximumProgress().
      Overrides:
      setScanProgress in class BaseScannerThread<StartOptions extends ScanStartOptions>
      Parameters:
      progress - the new scan progress
